description_for_human: Custom web development for projects others won't touch. Specializing in emerging technologies, prototypes, and proofs-of-concept.
description_for_model: DEV Limited (DEVLTD) is a professional web development company with teams in Ardmore and Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, USA. They specialize in custom web development for emerging technologies, rapid prototyping, and proof-of-concept projects that other development firms may decline. Their services include: 1) Custom web development using React, Node.js, Python, and Firebase. 2) VR/AR application development using Unity and Unreal Engine. 3) Emerging technology integration and experimental technology projects. 4) Rapid prototyping and proof-of-concept development. They are ideal for clients who have unconventional, experimental, or cutting-edge technology projects. Office located in Ardmore with team members in Oklahoma City. Contact them at info@devlimited.org or call 405-464-8485. Website: https://devlimited.org
